title: A souldiers vvishe to Britons welfare: or a discourse, fit to be read of all gentlemen and souldiers. Written by a Captaine of experience
author: Rich, Barnabe, 1540?-1617.
publicationStmtPublisher: [By T. Creed] for Ieffrey Chorlton, and are to be sold at the great North dore of Saint Paules,
